import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import { useFormik } from 'formik'; function Signup() { const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { email: '', username: '', password: '' }, onSubmit: (values) => { console.log(values)} }) return (
Email Address Username Password Confirm Password
//test form
Email address We'll never share your email with anyone else. Password
); } export default Signup;
